properties.sfomuseum:airport: Mills Field Municipal Airport of San Francisco
properties.sfomuseum:description: Facsimile of correspondence from Ogden Mills of Mills Estate Incorporated, to Joseph J. Phillips, Right of Way Agent for City and County of San Francisco, January 28, 1927, concerning terms of three-year lease of 150 acres of Mills Estate in San Bruno for use as temporary airport; two pages; file copy, not signed or mailed.
